title: Norris leads FP2 as McLaren dominates - 2025 Hungarian GP results
summary: Norris goes quickest in second practice in Hungary by nearly three tenths from Piastri

qa_pairs.question: Which driver topped the timesheet in the second practice session at the 2025 Hungarian GP?

Which team did Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri represent during FP2 at the 2025 Hungarian GP?
